content:
No worries at all! I understand now.

You're welcome for the help, and I'm glad I could assist you in planning your dinner party. It sounds like it's going to be a fun event! If you need any more help or advice, feel free to ask.

Remember to send out those invites and finalize the details, and I'm sure your dinner party will be a hit. Have fun planning, and I hope you and your friends have a fantastic time together!
